commit.message:
re PR c++/39225 (ICE if destructor doen't match class name)

        PR c++/39225
        * decl.c (grokdeclarator): Handle ~identifier.

From-SVN: r144314

files.patch:

+
+	PR c++/39225
+	* decl.c (grokdeclarator): Handle ~identifier.
+
